column4: is there anyone here who can help me get cairo dock to work in 3d view aswell? and not just 2D ? i have already clicked on the views tab and i dont have the choice for 3d
hmm.. I'm running the cairo dock in 3d.. let me check

in the cairo dock configuration thingy.. the views panel you should see the configuration for the Main dock and for sub docks.. at the right there should be a drop down menu with different options such as curve, 3d plane and so on
i dont have the option for all that. i just have the choice in the drop down for 2d view
